attributes.action: An urge to make the locations of pedophiles and sex offenders known to the public
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to urge the government to make all pedophiles and sex offenders known to the public based on the area in which they live. As parents it is our duty to protect our children, this duty cannot be completely fulfilled when pedophiles and sex offenders are allowed to have their identities hidden. Until we are aware of the location of all sexual predators our children will never be safe.
